title: Pet Friendly, Fitness Center, Washer/Dryer Included
posting_body: Just 16 miles north of Seattle, located in the picturesque city of Lynnwood, Washington, Tivalli Apartments is the embodiment of sophistication and convenience.

Nestled along the North Puget Sound, our community of studio, one, two and three bedroom apartment homes is meticulously outfitted with high-end contemporary finishes, sleek fixtures, and smart home technology that personify luxury and innovation.
Each detail is carefully considered with you in mind, including the polished granite countertops, stainless steel EnergyStar appliances, in-unit washer and dryer, and large private balconies.

Kitchen island or breakfast bar with pendent lighting available-Contemporary appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, ice maker, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Keyless smart lock technology                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Private patio or Juliet balcony-Vaulted ceilings-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-Smart thermostat                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-App-controlled smart home automation including smart plug, hub, voice assistant, and leak detector-Wood-style plank flooring

Resident social lounge with TVs and shuffleboard table-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Sports courts and onsite playground-Fenced dog park with pet watering station-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck-Package lockers with convenient access to packages                                                                                         Featured amenity-Controlled-entry access
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
